metadata.synopsis: The player attempts to use an inactive planecaster in the security office of the Creche, and comments on it. The planecaster unlocks the Orpheus Box, but this PAD covers both knowing and not knowing that.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1357; -11; -660 in CRE_Main_A, and interact with S_CRE_SecurtiyOfficePlanecaster (don't talk to the Inquisitor beforehand).
